description: Easter is almost here, which means it's time to start planning your celebratory menu! If you're looking for a show-stopping cocktail to serve at your Easter brunch, look no further than the Tiffany&nbsp;Mimosa.This gorgeous drink gets its robin's egg blue color from&nbsp;blue curacao and will surely make you and your guests’ Easter celebrations more fun and colorful.Make sure to refrigerate both your&nbsp;sparkling wine and your blue curacao ahead of time so that everything is nice and chilled when you're ready to assemble the drinks.
name: Tiffany Mimosa
